name: Microsoft Bytecode Engineering Library
short_description: The Microsoft Bytecode Engineering Library is a library written completely in Java that allows the user to parse, create, edit, and rewrite .NET assemblies. The code originally came from the University of Arizona. http://www.cs.arizona.edu/projects/mbel/
